Lists.desc: • Fixed In Alert > Event History, fixed the issue where the event list appears and then disappears when the query period is changed during a data view.
Feature In Table view on the Trace analysis window, added the SERIAL field in the modal that is activated by clicking the DB Connection and SQL steps.
Changed Modified to display for both the unpaid amount for the invoice scheduled to be issued and the unpaid amount for the issued invoice, if there is an unpaid amount upon withdrawal of membership.
Fixed In Cluster > kube-apiserver Dashboard, changed the request API.
Fixed In Analysis > Lock tree, fixed the issue where it does not go to the corresponding time even though there is any lock session.
New The Beta service of the Go monitoring product is ended and the official service release is now started.
Fixed Fixed the issue where clicking is intermittently impossible when using the side menu collapse mode.
Fixed Changed the MemUsage metric to the MemWs metric in the following menu paths:
Lists.details:
• Dashboard > Container Map
  • Dashboard > Performance summary
  • Container > Container list
  • Workload > Pod List
  • Cluster > kube-apiserver Dashboard

Lists.desc: Fixed In Management > Agent Installation, fixed the layout style error.
Fixed In Dashboard > Instance list, fixed the problem where the pop-up XOS metric integration guide modal does not appear.
New Reorganized the side menus.
Lists.details: The side menus have been reorganized. The previous UI structure where the projects and project menus were separated at the top and bottom, has been reorganized into the menu-centered structure. To check the changed items in the service screen, select Tutorials below the side menu.

Lists.desc: New Added the SSO account linking option.
New Added the Event configuration New function that has strengthened user experience based on the metric field.
New Added the Kubernetes Agent List menu to check the installation status of master and node agents.

New Added the kube-apiserver Dashboard menu to monitor the availability and performance of the cluster by collecting health and performance metrics for kube-apiserver and tracing the response times, throughput, request failures, and such.
Changed Modified the guidance message display method to modal when the number of created projects is limited.
Changed When creating a project, added Network Performance Monitoring to the product recommendation banner, and then deleted the Java product.
Feature Added the group widget copying feature.
Feature Added the Merge multiple projects metric in the Apdex*100 widget on the dashboard.
Feature Added a widget button to go to the product's dashboard.
Changed Modified the window mode button of the widget ( → ).
Changed Modified to use the 5-minute and 1-hour statistical categories for the cloud-related metrics: aws_, azure_, ncloud_, and oci_.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the number of events in the event timeline widget intermittently increases differently from the actual event count.
Fixed Modified to move to the dashboard list when loading the dashboard fails.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the label text of the highest value is cut off when displaying the maximum value in a chart on the dashboard.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the Y-axis threshold label text displayed on a chart is cut off.
Feature When adding or modifying the metrics events in Alert > Event configuration, improved the visibility of the dark theme applied to the product logo for Category.
Fixed In Notification setting, modified the Unblock SMS button in the Avoids a large number of alerts panel to be disabled.

Fixed For all products except URL, in Event configuration, fixed the issue where the chart is not drawn when there is only one time point for data on the notification rule test chart when setting metrics events.
Fixed In Notifications, fixed the issue where the columns in the table are pushed to the right if the member name is too long in the Event notification settings per-user section table.
Changed In Project Subscription Status, changed from Including projects that user does not have billing role to Shows all paid projects and added the tooltip.
Changed In Payment information, modified the text to consent to the terms and conditions when registering a card payment method.
Changed Change the title on the Add Group page: Project list → Add Group.
Changed In Integrated member management, modified to display an alert when a unique member who has the roles for payment and member management has been deleted.
Fixed In Integrated member management, disabled the Delete button to prevent the members in the subgroups under organization from being deleted.
Fixed In Integrated member management, modified the width of the member list table.
Changed When the OTP key has not been generated at the Multi-factor authentication section, the Send OTP key via email button has been disabled.
Fixed In My profile, fixed the issue where even tags are copied when copying a reason for not being able to withdraw from membership.
Changed Applied the dark theme to WhaTap logo in the About WhaTap Monitoring window, and added WhaTap Network to the platform.
Feature In Dashboard > Transaction map, applied a new UI with features reorganized.
Lists.details:
• Expanded the data inquiry section up to 10 minutes in the past.
  • Through the Trace analysis window, the maximum number of searchable data has been increased (100 → 1000).
  • Displays the counts for transactions and errors in real time.
  • Keyboard events have been added in the Top 30 list.
  • The keyboard events have been added in charts.
  • When searching the previous data, the data received from the server can be filtered.

Lists.desc: Changed In the Trace analysis window, improved the CRUD display format when checking the SQL details.
Changed In Dashboard > Application dashboard, added the All APPS. tag in the Today's TPS and Today's visits widgets.
Changed In Dashboard > Application dashboard, modified the design elements in the chart area (modified the widget title size, widget spacing, and chart section text size).
Changed In Flex board, changed the unit name of the agent group provided in the Filter tab.
Lists.details:
• Agent kind → By kind

  • Agent node → By server

  • Application → Agent

Lists.desc: Feature Provided the agent installation package and instructions for the AIX operating system.
Fixed In Server list > Server Detail, fixed the part where the chart area is hidden when there are too many legend items.
Lists.details: • If the number of legends increases, modified to expose the More button and display a drop-down menu when the button is selected.

Lists.desc: Fixed In Metrics Chart, modified to display the byte unit displayed in the network traffic related charts to the bit unit.
Feature Added a guidance for replacement of the XOS2 metric.
Feature In the Alert > Event configuration > Database tab, the agent restoration notification function (Notify when event status is resolved.) has been added.
Feature In Management > Agent list, added the DB IP column that displays the IP address of the database server.
Changed In Management > Agent Installation, added considerations depending on the operating system when entering commands to create a DB user file.
Fixed In the Alert > Event configuration > Database tab, modified the text, Database inactive alert to Inactive agent alert.

Fixed In Management > Agent list, changed the color of the status icon and modified to check with the tooltip when you place the mouse over whether the text size for the Name(Initial) or DB IP column is greater than the column width.
Deprecated In Alert > Event history, deleted the Alert log button.
Feature Added the function to display the session details when a column is clicked in the Lock tree table in the following paths:
Lists.details:
• Dashboard > Instance monitoring
  • Dashboard > Multiple instance monitoring
  • Analysis > Lock tree

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where the waiter ID does not appear in the Lock tree table in the following menu paths:
Lists.details:
• Dashboard > Instance monitoring
  • Dashboard > Multiple instance monitoring
  • Analysis > Lock tree

Lists.desc: Changed In Dashboard > Instance monitoring / Multiple instance monitoring, modified to enable the Lock tree in the table below if the chart of the Lock Wait Sessions widget is clicked.
Changed In Dashboard > Instance monitoring, added the default presets (Default(rds), Default(xos)).
Feature In Analysis > Database parameter, added unit notation to some values when displaying the Value column.
Feature Added the plan search function in JSON format.
Feature In Stat/Report > Database size, added the function to check the column and index lists when the TABLENAME column is clicked in the Table size (TOP 50) table.
Changed In Management > Agent Installation, added descriptions for the uid.sh execution command that differ depending on the Redis version.
Feature In Dashboard > Container Map, added the ReplicationController grouping option.
Changed When using the comparison feature in Container > Container list, added the Container CPU Usage chart in the Default and CPU tabs.
Changed In Cluster > Object Manifest, modified the UI design and added TOC for the Compare function.
Changed In Dashboard > Container Map, modified the UI display when the block size is small.
Changed In Container > Container Images, changed the columns.
Fixed In Dashboard > Container Map, fixed the issue where data is not visible when no data is associated with a selected grouping option.
Fixed In Container > Container volume, modified the icon when UsedPercent is 100%.
Changed In Log, modified to share all the table settings of the project in Live Tail, Log search, and Log Trend.
Changed In Alert > Event configuration, modified the style of the guide message that appears when the log monitoring is disabled.
Fixed In Management > Agent Installation, modified to connect the guide for the user-selected language.
Feature Added the network status metrics in the page load hitmap data: Valid connection type, RTT, and Valid bandwidth.
Lists.details:
• Page Load Hitmap widget in Dashboard > Browser Monitoring Dashboard
  • Analysis > Page Load Hitmap

Lists.desc: Feature In Analysis > Page Load Hitmap, added metrics in the resource data of the Page load Detail window: Status code, Delivery Type,
Feature Added the network status metrics for the AJAX hitmap data: Valid connection type, RTT, Valid bandwidth, and Delivery Type.
Lists.details:
• Analysis > AJAX Hitmap

  • AJAX Hitmap widget in Dashboard > Browser Monitoring Dashboard

Lists.desc: Feature Added the option to identify AWS resources when installing the agent.
Changed In Dashboard > Network topology and Network trend (TCP), modified to enable the real-time view for the last 5 minutes.
Changed In Dashboard > Network topology, modified as follows:
Lists.details:
• Among topology options, changed the name of the Edge option to Indicator.

  • Among the topology options, deleted the node size weight option and changed the node size weight to be set according to the selected Indicator option.

Lists.desc: Fixed In Dashboard > Network topology, fixed the issue where all tags appear as unselected when the page is refreshed with a preset selected.
Fixed Under Analysis, added missing searchable fields, and modified to expose only the fields that can be searched in each menu.
Lists.details:
• Added the session_count field in the following two menus:

  • TCP session: Added the avg_jitter and avg_latency fields.

  • UDP session: Modified not to display the avg_jitter, avg_latency, lost_count, and retransmission_count fields.

Lists.desc: Fixed In Management > Agent Installation, fixed the issue where AWS resource options entered in the Kubernetes tab are not reflected in the downloaded YAML file.
Fixed Modified the image for the language set in the agent installation menu.
Fixed Fixed the issue where the Docs (guide) link is not connected in some menu paths.
Fixed In some elements, fixed the issue where the dark theme is not applied.
Fixed In the sidebar and Sitemap, fixed the issue where some menus do not appear.
Fixed In Network topology, modified to perform line wrapping depending on the length of the title under the Filter tab.
Fixed Fixed the agent IP address display issue when adding a maintenance plan.
